Text: The description of this movie cracks me up! Where does this blast of air that is heading for earth come from. Space? Yeah! Space is full of air! If an eclipse could do this just try to image what would happen on a cloudy day! I hate sci-fi when it contains no "sci" and only "fi". This kind of story belongs in the 9/11 commission report, another horrible work of complete fiction that defies any real laws of physics. Okay, now I'll go download it just because I like really bad movies.
